h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Captain Lotus-Vision
content: Luckily, he'll get rid of all the corpses later in the fight, and they won't respawn for future attempts.
